Reviews.Title: “OK for the price, but just OK”
Reviews.Author: LizzyWA
Reviews.Content: Booked the hotel months in advance. The wi-fi did not work when we were there and we were told it had not been working for days. The beds were comfortable. There were open cracks in the wall/ceiling junctions (I am finding that in a lot of hotels lately on this trip). There were short black hairs on the tub/shower walls and in the tub. We noticed this in the morning after staying the night. That is not acceptable. Housekeeping is slacking... The location was convenient.

Reviews.Title: “The WORST!!!”
Reviews.Author: Phil J
Reviews.Content: Will NEVER stay here again. Travel to Branson about 10 times a year and this was the WORST. Frist, sent to the wrong room, had not even been touched by housekeeping. Second, Wifi worked about 20 minutes out of the 4 days I was there. I asked to speak with the manager and was told she was in a meeting and would call me back, even took my cell number, did she call HELL NO. If she don't care, then I don't either. Hotel wasn't booked with motorcycle rallies in town so I guess this has happened before. I live in Arkansas and have many friends that go to Branson because of the distance and will NOT be giving this place any business by word of mouth. Stay away from this place!!! Pay a little more, it will be worth it. Oh yeah, Air conditioner didn't work the first night. Would cool off to about 70 and then shut down and not turn back on till it was about 85. Again, stay away from this place!!!

Reviews.Title: “OK Place”
Reviews.Author: maccogirl
Reviews.Content: I bought a coupon for this motel from a local tv station (price $33), so it was definitely worth the money. First, it is not a Super 8. We learned the owner/manager has three hotels--this one, Super 8, and Dockers Inn. The Plantation Inn is directly behind the Plantation Restaurant on west 76. If you are looking for a big sign, you will miss it. It is three-stories, but it is built on a hill, so two of the floors are very accessible (didn't see an elevator to the third floor). On the ground floor you can park in front of your room. On the second floor you park and walk up three small steps. Room was clean, beds comfortable, AC worked and was quiet, sink/dressing area was outside the bath area. Wi-Fi included. No refrig/microwave. Breakfast consisted of cereal and toast, coffee and juice. Small pool was clean. There was nothing really special about this location, but there was nothing to complain about.

Reviews.Title: “We will never go back”
Reviews.Author: SpokaneRosebud
Reviews.Content: We had dirty carpets, no blow dryer was in the room and we had to ask for one. Someone had took the other one. No pool table, no business center,no hair salon, no DVD or VCR player, no plug in the tub and only one ice machine had ice and there are 3 floors. I ask the desk person why a lot was not there that the website said was there and he said they put on the website what they want to.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice for the price.”
Reviews.Author: beachinfool
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for the weekend. Check-in was a breeze. Room was clean and comfortable. Beds were nice. Location was very good, one block from 76 right on the yellow route. The continental breakfast was better than average, they offer waffles, biscuts and gravy, etc. Overall, very clean place, good location, and great for the price. Would definately stay here again and would recommend to anyone. A+.

Reviews.Title: “convenient, clean, comfortable and worth the value”
Reviews.Author: vmartin123
Reviews.Content: Clean room, comfortable bed, friendly staff and nice pool for the kids.T.his hotel is located just off the main drag in Branson. We would stay here again. The contential breakfast includes cold items such as donuts, toast, cereal, juice and coffee. Microwavable oatmeal is available.

Reviews.Title: “Fair”
Reviews.Author: ginnylou
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 days, the room was clean and the breakfast was better than average for a continental breakfast, they had biscuits with sausage gravy, delicious. Really the only negative was they never cleaned the room the whole time we stayed. We had to go ask for towels and toilet paper, we like our room cleaned when we come back to the room, so we were a little surprised at this.But for the price, not bad.

Reviews.Title: “Would not stay again...”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Room was not clean. Sold a non-smoking room that had been chain smoked in. Stinch from the smoking was unbearable. Asked for another room at 11pm and was told to turn on an ozone machine that was in the room on a table in the corner (hint), given a can of spray. Returned to the office at midnight. Locked and dark. Moved to a lovely Days Inn across the street after a sleepless, miserable night. Was told I could not be moved to a room that was waiting for a 1pm guest the next afternoon because my room would not be fumigated in time for them?? I was given a refund for the two nights I was not staying, I had to ask for the first (and only) night to be refunded it was never offered to me for my inconvience. No other amenities. No coffee pot in room, no shampoo, lotion, etc.. Would not recommend the Plantation Inn in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Not for Me”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Hotel was not at all what I expected after reading the great reviews. The cleanliness was definitely not up to par and the decor was (for lack of a better word) depressing. Staff was indeed friendly but will definitely find a different location to stay next time.

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed here from Aug 5th through Aug 8th, 2004. We have stayed at a couple of other hotels in Branson before but after reading the reviews, we had decided to try this hotel this year. The price was average for 4 people ($50). The pool is nice. I would have liked to have had a hot tub. We enjoyed the close proximity to so many things along the strip. The restaurant is good, typical Branson buffet. The beds were a little too firm for us. (That is when the hot tub would have come in handy.) Our room was kind of noisy. We got a lot of vehicle noise from the small road right beside the hotel. (There was a gap between the door and the jam and we could see daylight through it. That may have been the reason for the noise coming in.)You could however see the fireworks every night from Celebration City. Everyone here is very nice and helpful. Rooms are clean with plenty of space for 4 people. All in all it isn't a bad hotel, we probably will not stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, but not nessecarily THE Best”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: After having worked in the cleaning indrusty - I know the definition of clean. Housekeeping needs a little help at the Plantaion Inn. After all the wonderful reviews I read on trip advisor, I decided to give Plantation Inn a shot. Small things that would be overlooked by most will get noticed by myself. Lets confirm the positive aspects of this hotel first. --Very friendly staff makes you feel at home --Well maintained grounds makes for a pleasant atmosphere to relax --No bugs --Great location accessible from the yellow route and the strip. --I was impressed with hotel because the pictures on the hotel website dont do it alot of justice. Its really nicer than it looks. I was however, unimpressed with the cleanliness of our room. Most importantly - Our Bathroom Was Clean - No hair in the tub, however the rest of our room need attention to detail. The carpets needed a good vacumming in the corners and all around the edges of the room. the little ledges on the furniture need a good dusting, and worst of all... I noticed how dirty the floor was behind the nightstand after having to pick up a toy that my child threw back there. I pulled the nightstand out so housekeeping could see it too. As we loaded up our family van and cleared the room out we let the housekeeper in the room to get started and she put that nightstand right back where it belonged without cleaning under it. Also, when we checked into our room - I was browsing through the drawer of the nightstand and found trash from a previous guest including an old calling card & the guests reservation confirmation with all of their personal info on it. Its probably still there cause I think I put it back. --The Plantation Inn Restaraunt was ok. The food was good except for the scrambled eggs which had a fishy taste to them - and the coffee was so weak you could see right through the pot. And, Our server who was very professional and gave great service, looked like a total slob. --Would I recommend it? Sure, if you feel 50 a night is a good deal, and you can refrain from nit picking every little thing. There are no refridgerators, microwaves, coffeemakers, or hair dryers in the room. There is no free continental breakfast. The rooms are almost clean enough to stay in and the grounds are in tip top shape. --Will I stay again? Probably not. The amenities do not meet my needs. And the carpets really turned me off. Most dust is made up of dead skin cells shed from the human body.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: In todays world, CUSTOMER SERVICE is mostly a thing of the past. BUT, at the Planation Inn Reservation service in Branson, OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE is an every day event. We saw the ad in the Branson Chamber book and checked out the Plantation Inn Branson's website, then we used their toll free phone number and called them. A young lady named Diane answered. We told her that we had never been to Branson. She proceeded to ask us a bunch of questions that allowed her to custom tailor a vacation package for us. When we arrived in Branson, at the Plantation Inn, we received all of our show tickets and dining coupons. EVERY SHOW that DIANE recommended was to our liking. The breakfasts, lunches & dinners at the Plantation Inn Resturant & the Dockers Resturant were excellent. The rooms in the Plantation Inn were spotless. The LOCATION of the Plantation Inn was just great. We had NO TROUBLE finding our shows with the CUSTOM MAP given to use by DIANE. We had a marvelous time. We felt that our vacation would not have been as wonderful, without the excellent help of DIANE. She is the QUEEN OF CUSTOMER SERVICE.

Reviews.Title: “Best we've found in Branson”
Reviews.Author: ralphieohio
Reviews.Content: Very nice accomodations in a very good location. Extremely easy to customize your package and have your tickets waiting when you arrive. Breakfast buffet can't be beat. Enjoyed every minute of our stay.

Reviews.Title: “We love the Plantation and their staff”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have been to Branson 6 times and everytime we have stayed at the Plantation Inn and eaten at the Plantation rest. They just don't come any better! Linda, we love you and thank you for all your efforts in getting us the best seats in town.

Reviews.Title: “stayed 3 times great staff and food”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Great Staff , The breakfast can"t be beat , Good location

Reviews.Title: “Very Friendly Staff - Great Location - Outstanding Food”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Branson for about 15 years. We have been eating at the Plantation Restaurant all these years. When they put a hotel in the back of the restuarant, we started to stay here. The Food is Great, the Staff is wonderful, and the LOCATION -- is tough to beat. All this is one outstanding place. We have also used the hotels ticket service. We have NEVER BEEN disappointed with the seats obtained, or the shows recommended. Check them out ... --- you will be glad you did.

Reviews.Title: “plantation inn great location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: One of the best things about this hotel is the ease of driving to the attractions. If you learn the colored bypass routes you just have to get on the yellow behind the hotel and you can get to 90% of the attractions without being in a traffic jam. The ticket service is outstanding. Order any package a few months early and you,ll be in the first few rows for most shows. The breakfast bar has everything you could even think of. The rooms are clean and the front desk very helpfull. The only improvement I would like is a small refrigerator for snacks and drinks. Overall a good place to stay at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “Great Food & Wonderful Location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a short trip to Branson. We stayed at the Plantation Inn on Hwy 76. We stayed their because so friends of ours stayed here in May. The Hotel owners also own 2 Resturants - the Plantation Resturant & Dockers Resturant. We ate at both and found them to be exceptional. Both have buffets, but you can also order off a menu. We found that the price of the buffet and the price of ordering off the menu was about the same. We went to 2 shows that we reserved thru the Plantation Inn Reservation service --- ... We got GREAT seats. Linda did a wonderful job getting us these tickets. They where waiting for us when we arrived.

HotelInfo.Name: Super 8 Plantation Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 3470 Keeter St, Branson, MO 65616
